description:
This course is designed to introduce you to Reiki, a phenomenal energy which has been used for many centuries, throughout the world, as a healing technique. It is used to realign mental, physical and emotional imbalances.

The course is split into over 50Â unique, easy to follow parts starting with Reiki Level I which has been written with the absolute beginner in mind. The course covers such topics as the Origins of Reiki, the Benefits of Reiki treatment and the Correct positions required for a Reiki treatment. You will also learn about receiving Universal Energy.

Reiki Level II is a much more in depth course in which you will learn about the Reiki power symbols, their uses and significance, which are an essential part of the Reiki treatment, you will also learn how to send distant healing.

Reiki Level III - Art is the first part of your Reiki Master course designed for students who have completed Levels I and II and want to gain their Masters certificate, in this level you will cover the uses and significance of Chakras, Crystals, Meditation and The Master symbol.

Reiki Level III - Teacher is the second part of the Masters course and will teach you about Attunements, how to prepare for a treatment and how to teach a Reiki class.

The course includes in-depth manuals covering all aspects of the course plus special edition videos, which guide you through the Attunement process.

On completion of each level you will receive a distant Attunement followed by the relevant certificate from your Reiki Master.

Why should someone choose this course?

This Reiki course allows you to gain a professional qualification at your own pace, working around your day to day commitments.

The Reiki knowledge you will gain from this course will allow you to not only treat yourself, your friends and family but will also qualify you to use Reiki in a professional capacity.
title: Reiki I, II, III ART & III Teacher Qualification
